named-query.name: BC_READ_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_TYPE_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT structuredContentType FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContentType structuredContentType WHERE structuredContentType.name = :name

named-query.name: BC_ACTIVE_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_BY_TYPE_AND_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT structuredContent FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContent structuredContent WHERE structuredContent.structuredContentType = :contentType AND (structuredContent.locale = :fullLocale OR structuredContent.locale = :languageOnlyLocale ) AND structuredContent.contentName = :contentName AND structuredContent.offlineFlag = false ORDER BY structuredContent.priority

named-query.name: BC_ACTIVE_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_BY_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT structuredContent FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContent structuredContent WHERE structuredContent.structuredContentType = :contentType AND (structuredContent.locale = :fullLocale OR structuredContent.locale = :languageOnlyLocale ) AND structuredContent.offlineFlag = false ORDER BY structuredContent.priority
